content.1: And at that time shall Michael stand up, the great prince which standeth for the children of thy people: and there shall be a time of trouble, such as never was since there was a nation
content.2: And many of them that sleep in the dust of the earth shall awake, some to everlasting life, and some to shame
content.3: And they that be wise shall shine as the brightness of the firmament; and they that turn many to righteousness as the stars for ever and ever.
content.4: But thou, O Daniel, shut up the words, and seal the book,
content.5: Then I Daniel looked, and, behold, there stood other two, the one on this side of the bank of the river, and the other on that side of the bank of the river.
content.7: And I heard the man clothed in linen, which
content.8: And I heard, but I understood not: then said I, O my Lord, what
content.9: And he said, Go thy way, Daniel: for the words
content.10: Many shall be purified, and made white, and tried; but the wicked shall do wickedly: and none of the wicked shall understand; but the wise shall understand.
content.13: But go thou thy way till the end
